content.raw:
I get the following error while trying to build handsim on Ubuntu 16.04:


```
#!
usr/include/boost/type_traits/detail/has_binary_operator.hp:50: Parse error at "BOOST_JOIN" 
src/CMakeFiles/HaptixGUIPlugin.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'src/__/include/handsim/moc_HaptixGUIPlugin.cxx' failed 
make[2]: *** [src/__/include/handsim/moc_HaptixGUIPlugin.cxx] Error 1 
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:125: recipe for target 'src/CMakeFiles/HaptixGUIPlugin.dir/all' failed 
make[1]: *** [src/CMakeFiles/HaptixGUIPlugin.dir/all] Error 2 
Makefile:160: recipe for target 'all' failed 
make: *** [all] Error 2


```

I am new to Gazebo, in general. Is there any way around this issue?
